Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointment

java.lang.Object
DBAccess.DBAppointment
public class DBAppointment extends Object
A class to communicate with the DB about Appointments.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointmentsFromDb

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsFromDb()
      Queries DB to gather data and create Appointment objects to be added to ObservableList.
      Returns:
      appointmentList list of Appointment objects representing data in the DB

    • insertAppointment

      public static boolean insertAppointment(int customerId, int contactId, int userId, String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end)
      Gathers data entered by user and combines with generated fields to insert new Appointments into DB.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID representing customer associated with appointment
      contactId - ID representing Contact associated with appointment
      userId - ID of user creating the appointment
      title - title of appointment
      description - description of appointment
      location - location of appointment
      type - type of appointment
      start - start Timestamp of appointment
      end - end Timestamp of appointment
      Returns:
      alertFlag boolean value representing if there are alerts preventing the insertion

    • updateAppointmentInDb

      public static void updateAppointmentInDb(int appointmentId, int customerId, int contactId, int userId, String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end)
      Gathers data entered by user and combines with generated fields to update Appointment in DB.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID representing customer associated with appointment
      contactId - ID representing Contact associated with appointment
      userId - ID of user creating the appointment
      title - title of appointment
      description - description of appointment
      location - location of appointment
      type - type of appointment
      start - start Timestamp of appointment
      end - end Timestamp of appointment

    • deleteAppointmentInDb

      public static void deleteAppointmentInDb(int appointmentId)
      Deletes Appointment from database using the Appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID (Primary Key) to remove from database

    • getAppointmentsByType

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<AppointmentType> getAppointmentsByType()
      Counts and groups Appointments by Type.
      Returns:
      appointmentsByType ObservableList of AppointmentType objects representing types of appointments and the number of each type

    • getNextAppointmentId

      public static int getNextAppointmentId()
      Finds MAX Appointment_ID from database.
      Returns:
      nextAppointmentID next integer after value of MAX(Appointment_ID)
